keyMoments.title: Gyro's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Gyro, captain of the Gyro Pirates, attempts to escape from Hody Jones after refusing to join the New Fish-Man Pirates as enslaved subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Gyro as a victim of Hody's brutality and demonstrates the threat Hody poses to anyone who opposes him.

keyMoments.title: Gyro's Ship Destroyed by Hody
keyMoments.description: Gyro's ship is completely destroyed by Hody Jones using only his jaws while chained, with Gyro and his crew barely escaping with their lives.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the overwhelming power difference between Hody and regular pirates, showing the threat level of the New Fish-Man Pirates.

reveals.information: Captain of the Gyro Pirates from South Blue, known as 'Crab-Hand' Gyro
Refused to join the New Fish-Man Pirates as enslaved subordinates

relationships.description: Gyro is hunted and defeated by Hody Jones for refusing to submit to the New Fish-Man Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Hody destroys Gyro's ship after he attempts to escape.

keyMoments.title: King Neptune's Grand Entrance
keyMoments.description: King Neptune makes his first appearance riding Megalo, introducing himself as the king of the Ryugu Kingdom in a theatrical and grand manner.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the legitimate ruler of Fish-Man Island and establishes him as a benevolent and hospitable leader who welcomes the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.quote: I am Neptune, King of the Ryugu Kingdom! I welcome you to Fish-Man Island!

keyMoments.title: Invitation to Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Neptune formally invites the Straw Hat Pirates to a banquet at Ryugu Palace as a gesture of hospitality and gratitude.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Neptune's friendly relationship with the Straw Hats and sets up their visit to Ryugu Palace.
keyMoments.quote: I would be honored if you would join me for a banquet at Ryugu Palace!

reveals.information: King of the Ryugu Kingdom and Fish-Man Island
Known as the 'Great Knight of the Sea' and 'God of the Sea'
Theatrical, hospitable, and kind ruler who welcomes visitors

relationships.description: Neptune welcomes Luffy and the Straw Hats to Fish-Man Island and invites them to his palace.

evolutionMoments.description: Neptune makes a grand entrance and formally invites the Straw Hats to Ryugu Palace.

relationships.description: Neptune rides Megalo, showing a close relationship with the shark.

keyMoments.title: Megalo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Megalo, a large shark, appears carrying King Neptune on his back during Neptune's grand entrance to meet the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Megalo as Neptune's companion and mount, showing the relationship between the king and sea creatures.

reveals.information: A large shark that serves as King Neptune's mount and companion

relationships.description: Megalo serves as Neptune's loyal mount and companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Megalo carries Neptune during his entrance.

keyMoments.title: Zeo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Zeo, a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and one of Hody Jones's officers, appears and explains the mechanics of Energy Steroids to demonstrate the New Fish-Man Pirates' power.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of Hody's key subordinates and provides crucial exposition about Energy Steroids.
keyMoments.quote: Fish-men are born with ten times the strength of humans. And Energy Steroids double our power with each pill we take.

keyMoments.title: Zeo Explains Energy Steroid Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Zeo provides detailed information about fish-men's natural strength advantage over humans and how Energy Steroids exponentially increase their power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the scientific/biological foundation for understanding the threat level of the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Fish-men are born with ten times the strength of humans. And Energy Steroids double our power with each pill we take.

reveals.information: Officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates under Hody Jones
Knowledgeable about Energy Steroids and fish-men biology

relationships.description: Zeo serves as one of Hody Jones's loyal officers in the New Fish-Man Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Zeo appears alongside Hody as one of his officers.

keyMoments.title: Dosun's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Dosun, a hammerhead shark fish-man, appears as one of Hody Jones's officers in the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the main antagonist group's officers.

reveals.information: Officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates

relationships.description: Dosun serves as one of Hody Jones's officers.

evolutionMoments.description: Dosun appears alongside Hody as one of his officers.

keyMoments.title: Daruma's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Daruma, a cookie-cutter shark fish-man, appears as one of Hody Jones's officers in the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the main antagonist group's officers.

reveals.information: Officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates

relationships.description: Daruma serves as one of Hody Jones's officers.

evolutionMoments.description: Daruma appears alongside Hody as one of his officers.

keyMoments.title: Ikaros Much's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Ikaros Much, a giant squid fish-man, appears as one of Hody Jones's officers in the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the main antagonist group's officers.

reveals.information: Officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates

relationships.description: Ikaros Much serves as one of Hody Jones's officers.

evolutionMoments.description: Ikaros Much appears alongside Hody as one of his officers.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody Destroys Gyro's Ship
keyMoments.description: Hody uses Energy Steroid-enhanced strength to completely destroy Gyro's ship using only his jaws while chained, demonstrating his overwhelming power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hody as an immensely powerful threat and shows the devastating effects of Energy Steroids.
keyMoments.quote: Let them escape. They'll spread the word of my power.

keyMoments.title: Hody's Motivation Revealed
keyMoments.description: Hody reveals his motivation, claiming to be the successor to Fisher Tiger and Arlong's wills in fighting against humans.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hody's ideological foundation and connects him to previous antagonists, showing how he perverts their legacies.
keyMoments.quote: Fisher Tiger and Arlong... both of their wills were destroyed by humans. But I will succeed where they failed!

keyMoments.title: Hody Vows to Kill Neptune
keyMoments.description: Hody declares his plan to assassinate King Neptune and establish fish-men as the superior race, ordering his crew to advance on Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the main conflict of the Fish-Man Island Arc.
keyMoments.quote: I will kill Neptune and prove that fish-men are the superior race! All forces, advance to Fish-Man Island!

abilities.description: Hody uses Energy Steroids to exponentially increase his already formidable fish-man strength.

reveals.information: Seeks to avenge Fisher Tiger and Arlong by killing Neptune and establishing fish-men supremacy
Plans to assassinate King Neptune and take over Fish-Man Island

relationships.description: Hody plans to assassinate Neptune and overthrow his rule.

evolutionMoments.description: Hody declares his intention to kill Neptune.

relationships.description: Hody pursues and defeats Gyro for refusing to join the New Fish-Man Pirates.
